targets.query:
from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "load" and
    r._field == "cpucore" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "load" and
    r._field == "min5" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean5")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "load" and
    r._field == "min15" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean15")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "load" and
    r._field == "min1" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean1")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "processcount" and
    r._field == "total" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r._field == "user" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "user")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r._field == "system" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "system")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "cpu" and
    r._field == "iowait" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "iowait")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    r._field == "used" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "used")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "mem" and
    r._field == "total" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "total")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "network" and
    (r._field == "rx" or r._field == "time_since_update") and
    r.interface_name == "${interface}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.rx / r.time_since_update) * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "rx_rate"})

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "network" and
    (r._field == "tx" or r._field == "time_since_update") and
    r.interface_name == "${interface}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.tx / r.time_since_update) * -8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "tx_rate"})

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memswap" and
    r._field == "used" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "used")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "memswap" and
    r._field == "total" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "total")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "diskio" and
    (r._field == "read_bytes" or r._field == "time_since_update") and
    r.disk_name == "${disk}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.read_bytes / r.time_since_update) }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "read_rate"})

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "diskio" and
    (r._field == "write_bytes" or r._field == "time_since_update") and
    r.disk_name == "${disk}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> pivot(
    rowKey:["_time"],
    columnKey: ["_field"],
    valueColumn: "_value"
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r.write_bytes / r.time_since_update) * -1.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "write_rate"})

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "fs" and
    r._field == "used" and
    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "used")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "fs" and
    r._field == "size" and
    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "size")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "fs" and
    r._field == "percent" and
    r.mnt_point == "/" and 
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> last()

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "sensors" and
    r._field == "value" and
    r.label == "Ambient" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Ambient")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "sensors" and
    r._field == "value" and
    r.label == "CPU" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "Ambient")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "containers" and
    r._field == "memory_usage" and
    r.name == "${container}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "MEM")

from(bucket: "glances")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "containers" and
    r._field == "cpu_percent" and
    r.name == "${container}" and
    r.hostname == "${host}"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "CPU%")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "hostname",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: host
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "hostname",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: container
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)

    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "interface_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: interface
list.query:

    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "interface_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d

import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "disk_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: disk
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "disk_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
